ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: My fingers are numb...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, don t feel bad.  I m level 58, and I didn t realize that our mez overwrites theirs (and can t be overwritten by theirs) until this weekend.  Luckily, I
ygData.messageBody:
Well, don't feel bad. I'm level 58, and I didn't realize that our mez overwrites theirs (and can't be
overwritten by theirs) until this weekend. Luckily, I didn't get us all killed, but the Enchanter did get
really snippy. Shows how often I group with Enchanters.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 58 songs, Innoruuk


"Cranfill, Wendy" wrote:

> Thanks for the explanation. i asked one of the Bard mains in my guild and
> they were like "It is, it sucks, go make a post about it" lol. Seems really
> stupid to me that it works that way. Makes me feel bad cuz i was trying to
> help our chanter mez like 6 things and I just made it so he couldn't and we
> all died. *shrug* guess you have to learn the hard way sometimes :)
